item.description:
In October, we're moving back to a SATURDAY Meetup. Also, to get away from the holiday, I'm moving the Meetup back a week.

The Lincoln Street Cafe is at the Newton Highlands stop on the Green D Line, or the Lincoln Street stop for the 59 bus. Since it's small, there's an semi-official limit of 6 people. When more than that show up, the group tends to break into smaller groups and keep going.

This month's topic: Write something else!
Bring writing implements. Pen & Paper, keyboard, whatever you feel freest with.

Agenda:

4:00 Names.

Writing Exercise TBD.

5:00 Break

Open discussion. What would you like to talk about next?

6:00 Go Home and Write!

group.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers October Meetup
